response.overview: The Cannes Film Festival is one of the most important celebrity events in the world: for two weeks, this city gathers a considerable concentration of stars, producers, money, and luxury. But behind this glamorous image, this documentary attempts to shed light on the shadowy side of Cannes. The police officers and security agents dealing with an explosion of crime during the festival. The hard-working staff of luxury hotels who must go above and beyond to fulfill the stars' whims.
response.title: Cannes, l’envers du décor
